column5: Hey guys,  Dave had us put this little video together yesterday...  I thought it might brighten up some your wednesday mornings!  Enjoy!     By the way if somebody could help me figure out how to post these directly into a thread that'd be great!  Cheers, Ryan
Just under the message window when composing a post there's a drop-down menu "Post Options". Change it to HTML On Then you can use HTML code to embed in your post
LOL, thats good body control for sure.. thought he was going to come up with the fish in his teeth
Thanks Clof - I'll give it a shot next time!  Cheers, Ryan
that's funny.  he did save his hat though...
he said they are willing to do anything to get a fish in the boat? so wheres the fish mr.guide??
would have been better if a 50 inch musky grabbed his head.... haha j/k great little video.
The things we do for a fish LOL Good one Ryan!!  Thanks for sharing Jacques
